meanings.definition: Lacking style or good taste; gaudy or flashy.
meanings.sent1: The outfit she wore to the party was the tackiest one there.
meanings.sent2: The decorations on the cake were the tackiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at painting the house in neon colors was the tackiest thing I've witnessed.
meanings.sent4: The tackiest car in the parking lot had bright purple flames painted on the sides.
meanings.sent5: The tackiest room in the house was covered in clashing patterns and colors.

meanings.sent1: Her choice of words during the argument was the tackiest possible.
meanings.sent2: The tackiest decision he made was to wear sandals in the snow.
meanings.sent3: It was the tackiest move to tell a joke at such a serious moment.
meanings.sent4: The tackiest mistake in the game cost them the victory.
meanings.sent5: The tackiest behavior at the party was dancing on the tables.
